div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1032 Gumistavi, TSkhaltubo raion, Geor- (469) gia, 1918 Burial: before 325 B.C. (Golenko, Kapa- nadze) Contents: 83 AR. Pot hoard Colchis: hemidr. (10 of 13 described have ΜΟ) Disposition: dispersed Vasmer, 31 † Pakhomov II, 304 Zograph, "Nakhodky," 37
